text: Alice Cooper is the stage name of musician Vincent Furnier. Alice Cooper may also refer to: *Alice Cooper (band), the rock band fronted by Furnier *Alice Cooper (teacher) (1846-1917), a British headmistress *Alice Cooper (sculptor) (1875-1937), an American sculptor *Alice Cooper, a character on the television show Mayberry R.F.D. portrayed by Alice Ghostley *Alice Cooper (Archie Comics) **Alice Cooper, a character on the television show Riverdale portrayed by Mädchen Amick
title: Alice Cooper (disambiguation)
